name: Plastic Pals
description:
These two birds can't get along!

They've managed to get themselves stuck together inside of a plastic soda ring, and now have to work together to find a way to break free!

Controls are W A S D to move

[ Space ] is to jump

E swaps control between the birds. When controlling the pink bird, the yellow one will stand still, acting like an anchor  until you switch back or throw it.

To throw the yellow bird first pick it up by pressing E when close to it. Then press E again to toss it into the air.
